issue.title: [Release] Distinguish between closed and in-progress/open jiras without a linked patch in the release curation report
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13415](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13415). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`archery release curate 5.0.0` reports a lot of issues as `JIRA issues in version 5.0.0 without a linked patch`

There are in-progress/open ticket which need to be postponed or closed before cutting the release candidate but these are not listed separately from closed issues without a patch.
